column3: Also, add missing notes for #16383, follow up to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16690#discussion_r329287449
Right, future release notes draft at:\n\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/0.19.0-Release-Notes-Draft
Nit: use present tense here like the other notes do, e.g. s/will shuffle/now shuffles/
Suggestion: "Previously, inputs and outputs were added in the order PSBTs were provided. This made it easy to correlate inputs to outputs, representing a privacy leak."
I'd prefer to keep this move-only. It can be changed in the wiki by anyone, once they are moved: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/0.19.0-Release-Notes-Draft
